attribute-definition.description: This represents the UUID of the product line item that holds the qualifying product.
Renders an alternative URL in main navigation. Uses Commerce Cloud content url notation. For example: $url('Account-Show')$ or normal URL http://xchange.demandware.com

Used to define the content asset used to populate a grid page banner for a category. This value is applied to all sub-category navigation (cascading) if no specific catBannerID has been defined for a sub-category.
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this category.

Used to define if/when the Compare feature is to be visualized in the storefront based on navigation. If enableCompare = FALSE, no Compare checkboxes will be displayed in the grid view. If enableCompare = TRUE, the category (and its children) will support the Compare feature.
Which way to orient the menu and optional header menu HTML. Vertical will list all in one line. Horizontal will list in columns.

Used to indicate that a category (such as Mens -> Footwear -> Boots) will display in the roll-over navigation. A sub-category only shows if also the parent category is marked as showInMenu. Up to three category levels are shown in roll-over navigation.

Used to define the content asset ID of the Size Chart that is appropriate for products whose PRIMARY category is the associated category (and its children). Whenever a product detail page (or quick view) is rendered, the Size Chart link is populated based on the value of this attribute for the products primary categorization. If not defined, NO size chart link is displayed.
Image used on either the top or bottom slot on the category landing pages.
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this content asset.
The number of items returned by this customer
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this category.
Paypal order transaction Id used in PayPal Transaction (Business Manager Modules)
paypalPaymentMethod = 'express';
Represent currently billing agreement that will be used for payment
Paypal account email used for payment
Paypal order id from create order API call
paypal Payment Status
Needed for proper NVP Paypal Transactions
All transactions is related with the order
Signals if there are inventory lists for brick-and-mortar stores associated with this product.
Type of Boot for search refinement.
Bottom type for search refinement
Product color used for variation attribute
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this product.
This indiciates if the product is a new arrival.
This is the help text. It is used for sorting rules.
Kids Age used for search refinements
This attribute is used for mens and womens pants lengths.
Media Format
Memory Size
Type of Outerwear for search refinement
English Product Name
Type of Sandal for search refinement
Shows a season the product is assigned to.
test attribute
Type of Shoe for search refinements
This attribute is used for all footwear, apparel and accessory sizing for men, women and kids products.
Type of tops in clothing
Since we can not use variant attribute value we need this
Use this attribute to add thumbnail in nav carousel.
Attribute used for apparel waist sizing.
This attribute is used for shoe widths for mens, womens and kids.
This represents the UUID of the product line item that holds the qualifying product.
Links the store to the product line item for grouping shipments in the checkout process.
this custom attribute captures the original product line item uuid before it is part of an placed order
Array of saved billing agreements. Each billing agreement is an object with baID, email, defaul keys

value-definition.display: Can be combined with any promotion.
Can't be combined with promotions of the same class.
Can't be combined with any promotion.

attribute-definition.description: Used to map the shipment to a brick and mortar store.

attribute-definition.display-name: When this attribute equals 'instore', the checkout flow will assign the shipping method (005) which has a no shipping charge.

attribute-definition.description: This is text used by the end user when sending a message to the brick and mortar store about the shipment. This is reflected in the order export.
Item Code for Edea order item json, used when sending orders to Edea.
Used when sending orders to Edea.
Estimated days until delivery
List of IDs of the enabled alternative payment methods.
Will be displayed on the PayPal page if billing agreement feature is enabled. Maximum length: 128 characters
Determines if billing agreement will be created during checkout to registered users
Will be displayed on the PayPal page. Maximum length: 127 characters

attribute-definition.display-name: Show PayPal button on the cart page
Pay Pal API Credit Banner Styles
attribute-definition.description:
Return style configurations for Pay Pal Credit Banner (cart, product, category ) Available values: layout: 'flex', // flex, text styleColor: 'gray', // only for flex layout: blue, black, white, white-no-border, gray ratio: '8x1', // only for flex layout: 1x1, 1x4, 8x1, 20x1
{"cartCreditConfig":{"layout":"flex","styleColor":"gray","ratio":"8x1","logoType":"primary","logoPosition":"left","textColor":"black"},"productCreditConfig":{"layout":"text","styleColor":"blue","ratio":"8x1","logoType":"primary","logoPosition":"left","textColor":"black"},"categoryCreditConfig":{"layout":"flex","styleColor":"blue","ratio":"20x1","logoType":"primary","logoPosition":"left","textColor":"black"}}
The merchant for whom you are facilitating a transaction.
This determines whether the funds are captured immediately or later (Authorization)

attribute-definition.display-name: Pay Pal API Smart Button Styles
attribute-definition.description:
Return style configurations for Pay Pal smart button (cart, billing pages) * Available values: * height: (number) from 25 to 55, * color: (string) gold, blue, silver, black, white, * shape: (string) pill, rect, * layout: (string) horizontal, vertical, * tagline: (boolean) true, false
Default value: {"cart":{"height":35,"color":"gold","shape":"rect","layout":"vertical","label":"checkout","tagline":false},"checkout":{"height":35,"color":"gold","shape":"rect","layout":"vertical","label":"checkout","tagline":false}}

attribute-definition.display-name: Campaign ID for PayPal credit banner
attribute-definition.description: Id of the campaigning that will show the PayPal credit banner
PP MerchantPublisher ID for the credit banner and other financing tools

attribute-definition.display-name: Enable PayPal UK Credit Financial Options Banners
Show credit message on the cart page
Show credit message on the category page
Show credit message on the PDP page

attribute-definition.description: When true, this causes a TLS check to take place based on whether or not a cookie ('dw_TLSWarning') has been set on the browser
Default country code for store searches
Defines which environment is used to actually load the product images from.
Disable Responsive Design for Storefront
Folder directory that the edea integration works in.
Number of days files will stay in archive.
This Boolean toggles the option for infinite scrolling or pagination from within the search grid.
The attribute is used to enable/disable Multi-Shipment Checkout for each site via BM.
When true, this enables display of promotion callout messages on product tiles.
Enables the Wishlist plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The cartridge plugin_wishlists must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
This number indicates the number of times failures for Logins, GiftCert Balances, and Order Tracking requests will be allowed before displaying a CAPTCHA-style pop-up rate limiter

attribute-definition.display-name: Send order confirmation email to service email

attribute-definition.description: Enables the Apple Pay plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The cartridge plugin_applepay must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
Enables the Data Download plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The cartridge plugin_datadownload must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
Enables the Gift Registry plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The cartridge plugin_giftregistry must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
Enables the In Store Pickup Plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The plugin_instorepickup must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
Enables the Product Compare plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The cartridge plugin_productcompare must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
Enables the Wishlist plugin in the SFRA Unified Feature Cartridge. Note: The cartridge plugin_wishlists must be added to the cartridge path and uploaded to your instance.
